tr.td: Endoscopy applied after complete anesthesia, helicobacter pylori observed
The pacemaker has remote monitoring functionality as well.
The patient used to smoke. Now, proceeds with water pipe, about once a week
The patient is a drinker, although not heavy

section.title: Health Maintenance Care Plan
section.text: The patient should keep away from stress. Gastric problems are due to stress mostly.
